explains: n. 完胜（使对方无法得分的比赛）；停业，关闭

sentences.cn: 这是水手队第十次使对方一分也没得到。

sentences.en: The financial crisis also push our noshery to the edge of shutout .
sentences.cn: 金融危机又导致我家的餐饮店面临停业；

sentences.en: Sure, as I said, it would have been nice to have Wang get the shutout.
sentences.cn: 当然，像我先前说的，如果能让王拿到完封就更完美了。
